product_name: Blue Orange Spot It! On the Road Card Game
long_description: Cruising down the highway or just around town, be sure to pack Spot it! On the Road and never be bored traveling in the car again. This little tin offers everything needed for endlessly fun car games! Besides busting back-seat boredom, this game for 2 - 8 players improves visual perception, focus and reaction time. Includes 55 cards and illustrated rules.
short_description: Cruising down the highway or just around town, be sure to pack Spot it! On the Road and never be bored traveling in the car again. This little tin offers everything needed for endlessly fun car games!
